title: FT - 65 OJs - Stratton Louisville, King Kelly - for a 51 Bowman Mantle
author: cozmokramer

posts.post_title: FT - 65 OJs - Stratton Louisville, King Kelly - for a 51 Bowman Mantle
posts.post_content:
I have about 65 PSA graded Old Judges available. They can all be seen here - 

[url]http://www.psacard.com/psasetregistry/alltimeset.aspx?s=195729[/url]

I also have a raw SCOTT STRATTON Louisville card.

I am interested in trading many or all for a MID to HIGH grade 1951 bowman Mantle

Any interest?
How much for the JOHN LEIGHTON OJ?

[quote name="Fred" post=1474512]How much for the JOHN LEIGHTON OJ?[/QUOTE]


Pm sent
